languages.text: "И вновь я нахожу тебя в своих покоях, хотя тебе тут быть не положено. Уже похоже на традицию".
"Once again I find you in my quarters, even though you are not supposed to be in here. It is starting to become something of a habit."
languages.original_text: "И вновь я нахожу тебя в своих покоях, хотя тебе тут быть не положено. Уже похоже на традицию".

traits.locale_text: "Once again I find you in my quarters, even though you are not supposed to be in here. It is starting to become something of a habit."
"Once again I find you in my quarters, even though you are not supposed to be in here. It is starting to become something of a habit."
"Once again I find you in my quarters, even though you are not supposed to be in here. It is starting to become something of a habit."
"Once again I find you in my quarters, even though you are not supposed to be in here. It is starting to become something of a habit."

languages.text: “尽管你不该出现在我的房间里，但我发现你又出现了。看来，这已经变成你的习惯了。”
languages.original_text: "Once again I find you in my quarters, even though you are not supposed to be in here. It is starting to become something of a habit."

traits.locale_text: “尽管你不该出现在我的房间里，但我发现你又出现了。看来，这已经变成你的习惯了。”

languages.text: 「またお前が私の部屋にいるのを見つけた。ここにいるべきでないのに。習慣になりつつあるな」
languages.original_text: "Once again I find you in my quarters, even though you are not supposed to be in here. It is starting to become something of a habit."

traits.locale_text: 「またお前が私の部屋にいるのを見つけた。ここにいるべきでないのに。習慣になりつつあるな」

languages.text: «Una vez más la encuentro en mis aposentos, aunque se supone que no debe estar aquí. Esto empieza a convertirse en costumbre».
languages.original_text: "Once again I find you in my quarters, even though you are not supposed to be in here. It is starting to become something of a habit."

traits.locale_text: «Una vez más la encuentro en mis aposentos, aunque se supone que no debe estar aquí. Esto empieza a convertirse en costumbre».

languages.text: « Une fois encore, je vous retrouve dans mes quartiers alors que vous n'avez rien à y faire. Ça commence à devenir une habitude. »
languages.original_text: "Once again I find you in my quarters, even though you are not supposed to be in here. It is starting to become something of a habit."

traits.locale_text: « Une fois encore, je vous retrouve dans mes quartiers alors que vous n'avez rien à y faire. Ça commence à devenir une habitude. »

languages.text: "Wieder finde ich Euch in meinem Quartier vor, obwohl Ihr Euch hier nicht aufhalten sollt. Das wird allmählich zur Gewohnheit."
languages.original_text: "Once again I find you in my quarters, even though you are not supposed to be in here. It is starting to become something of a habit."

traits.locale_text: "Wieder finde ich Euch in meinem Quartier vor, obwohl Ihr Euch hier nicht aufhalten sollt. Das wird allmählich zur Gewohnheit."

languages.text: "Seni bir kez daha odamda buluyorum. Burada olmaman gerekmesine rağmen. Alışkanlık hâline getirmeye başlıyorsun."
languages.original_text: "Once again I find you in my quarters, even though you are not supposed to be in here. It is starting to become something of a habit."

traits.locale_text: "Seni bir kez daha odamda buluyorum. Burada olmaman gerekmesine rağmen. Alışkanlık hâline getirmeye başlıyorsun."
